column4: Hi everyone. I've got a problem getting Edgy to work with my laptop display. It's running vesa in X right now;  it does display 24bit at correct rez (1280x768) but it redraws windows really slow. It's a gateway laptop with a via chipset. How do I get it the right display driver?
what graphics card do you have?
do you have a name and model for the laptop?
